title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, create, pull, list, delete models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend in chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker or pip.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing chat, generate, pull, list, delete, embeddings with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, create, list, delete models in Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with readline history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: Jupyter notebooks showing RAG, function-calling, vision, fine-tuning, and more with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/CPU autoscaling and persistent model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (cuda, rocm, cpu) with one-liner commands to run Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: FastAPI backend, Chroma vector store, and React UI pre-configured for Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension to chat with any Ollama model inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with TypeScript support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, create, list, delete with idiomatic Go API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift Package Manager library for macOS/iOS apps to integrate Ollama chat and generation.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into a server with slash commands and moderation hooks.
